channel.title: Portforwarding for 2 wire
channel.description: does anyone have a 2 wire modem and can show me how to port forward with it . with pics.

item.title: Portforwarding for 2 wire
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

I have a 2 Wire modem

Go to the “Firewall” icon at the top of the 192.168.1.**.

Click “firewall settings”.

It should show various lists of servers or stuff, click “Add a new user-defined application”. (Should be under the list of server choices".

in “Application Name” put “Mopar Server” or whatever.

after that in the boxes named “From:” “To:”, put 43594.

NOTHING ELSE SHOULD BE ADDED.

After that, click “add definiton”.

After you click “Add definition” Click “Back”

Then look for “mopar server” on the list, click it once and then click add. and then in the bottom click done.

Also, you can only login through your server by this ip address “127.0.0.1” or leave it blank. OTHER PLAYERS CAN LOGIN TO YOUR SERVER IP, DONT WORRY.

if there’s any problems. post them here.

Read full topic
